support.header_title:
The browser you are using
does not support VIRNECT Remote service.
support.header_description:
Use the direct link button on the bottom to use VIRNECT Remote service.
Contact the Customer Center for details.
support.pc_web:
VIRNECT Remote web version
can be used on Chrome Browser for PC.
support.mobile: Download VIRNECT Remote <br class='noM'>from Google Play <br class='noM'>to use  VIRNECT Remote<br class='noPC'> on smartphone.
support.smart_glasses:
Smart Glass user
should visit VIRNECT Download Center
from Chrome Browser for PC.
